colleges.name: Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay
colleges.description: IIT Bombay is a leading engineering and technology university in India, renowned for its rigorous academics and vibrant campus life.

colleges.name: Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT)
colleges.description: MIT is a world-renowned private research university in Cambridge, Massachusetts, known for its cutting-edge research and innovation.

colleges.name: Indian Institute of Management, Ahmedabad
colleges.description: IIM Ahmedabad is a premier management institute in India, recognized globally for its excellence in management education.

colleges.name: Stanford University
colleges.description: Stanford University is a private research university in Stanford, California. Stanford is known for its academic strength, wealth, and proximity to Silicon Valley.

colleges.name: University of Cambridge
colleges.description: The University of Cambridge is a collegiate research university in Cambridge, United Kingdom. It is one of the world's oldest and most prestigious universities.

colleges.name: National University of Singapore (NUS)
colleges.description: NUS is a national research university in Singapore. Founded in 1905 as the Straits Settlements and Federated Malay States Government Medical School, NUS is the oldest autonomous university in the country.
